NewsArticle.Title: Unregistered Play/December Itemshop
NewsArticle.Content: On December 10th when Unregistered Play comes into effect... - Unregistered accounts will be able to purchase Kruna, access the itemshop, and purchase items from the itemshop. - A completely new account will receive an initial bonus of 1000 Kruna. - To purchase items from the itemshop, you need an account, registered or unregistered. Item Shop Release Dec. 12th. We will be releasing new items for the itemshop on Wednesday. Included in this release will be Holiday items that will be sold for a limited time!
